import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './LandingPage.css'; const categories = [ 'Graphics & Design', 'Digital Marketing', 'Writing & Translation', 'Video & Animation', 'Music & Audio', 'Programming & Tech', 'Business', 'Lifestyle' ]; const sampleGigs = new Array(8).fill(0).map((_, i) => ({ id: i + 1, title: `Professional Service ${i + 1}`, price: (5 + i * 10), seller: `Seller ${i + 1}` })); const LandingPage = () => { return (
